remarks: Value of the functor restriction operator on morphisms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
resf1st.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
resf1st.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. W ) $.
resf1st.s $e |- ( ph -> H Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
resf2nd.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
resf2nd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
resf2nd $p |- ( ph -> ( X ( 2nd ` ( F |`f H ) ) Y ) = ( ( X ( 2nd ` F ) Y ) |` ( X H Y ) ) ) $.
